description.value: Summary or persistent information about the typical alcohol consumption of an individual.

purpose.value: To record summary information about the individual's typical pattern of alcohol consumption.

definition.value: Summary or persistent information about the typical alcohol consumption of an individual.
@ internal @
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.

The applied definition for the 'Quit date' data elements used in this archetype.
The applied definition for a Quit attempt used to determine value for the 'Number of quit attempts' data element used in this archetype.
